misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires POST /api/auth/register endpoint, but code implements POST /api/auth/signup (file located at src/app/api/auth/signup/route.ts instead of register/route.ts)
Spec requires checkbox UI element for toggling task completion, but code implements a button with symbols (✓ or ○) instead of using the available Checkbox component
Spec requires displaying the actual user's name in the header, but code displays hardcoded mock value 'User' instead of fetching and displaying real user data
